title: Mallory
description: Fans of The Station Series will be happy to read the second Station novelette out this summer about the lovely Mallory Storm and how she came to arrive at the Station. Told from her perspective, readers get an insight into the inner workings of Mallory’s mind, and her early experiences in the Station after-life. Who was she before she died, and who is she now? The answers are waiting for you…‘Mallory’ is the second of three Station Series novelettes to be released this summer!Coming Soon – ‘Kerry-Anne’.
author: Trish Marie Dawson
